articles.title: Cop30: dozens of countries threaten to block resolution unless it contains roadmap to fossil fuel phase-out
articles.description: Exclusive: The Guardian understands Brazil had been planning to drop a roadmap to a transition away from fossil fuels amid opposition from petro statesCountries supporting a phase-out of fossil fuels at the Cop30 climate summit in Brazil have threatened to block any agreement that does not include such a commitment, in a significant escalation of tensions at the crunch talks, the Guardian can reveal.

articles.title: Cop30 climate summit in Brazil disrupted after fire breaks out in venue
